typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SAPId as string,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Street as string,
		StreetNumber as string,
		Type as string,
		RelatedId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SAPcsv
SAPcsv derive(FullStreet = Street+", "+StreetNumber,
		SyncStatus = "UpdatedFromSAP") ~> SAPcsvWithStreet
SortByAccountThenContact split(Type=="Company",
	Type=="Contact",
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitAccountAndContact@(Account, Contact, Error)
SAPcsvWithStreet sort(asc(Type, true),
	asc(RelatedId, true)) ~> SortByAccountThenContact
SplitAccountAndContact@Account sink(input(
		SAPId as string,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Street as string,
		ParentAccountId as string,
		SyncStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['SAPId'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SAPId,
		Name,
		Phone,
		Street = FullStreet,
		ParentAccountId = RelatedId,
		SyncStatus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CopyAccountToSqlTable
SplitAccountAndContact@Contact sink(input(
		SAPId as string,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Street as string,
		AccountId as string,
		SyncStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SAPId,
		Name,
		Phone,
		Street = FullStreet,
		AccountId = RelatedId,
		SyncStatus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CopyContactToSqlTable
